content.latex: Effectuer les divisions euclidiennes des polynômes définis ci-dessous.
content.html: Effectuer les divisions euclidiennes des polynômes définis ci-dessous.

\(X^4-3 X^3+4 X^2-6 X+8\) \(X-1\)
\(-\left(X^4-X^3\right)\) \(X^3-2 X^2+2 X-4\)
\(-2 X^3+4 X^2-6 X+8\)
\(-\left(-2 X^3+2 X^2\right)\)
\(2 X^2-6 X+8\)
\(-\left(2 X^2-2 X\right)\)
\(-4 X+8\)
\(-(-4 X+4)\) 4

\[A(X)=X^4-3 X^3+4 X^2-6 X+8=\underbrace{(X-1)}_{B(X)} \cdot\left(X^3-2 X^2+2 X-4\right)+4\]

content.latex:
$$
\begin{array}{r|r}
3 X^5+2 X^4-2 X^2+1 & X^3+X+2 \\
-\left(3 X^5+3 X^3+6 X^2\right) & 3 X^2+2 X-3 \\
\hline 2 X^4-3 X^3-8 X^2+1 & \\
-\left(2 X^4+2 X^2+4 X\right) & \\
\hline-3 X^3-10 X^2-4 X+1 & \\
-\left(-3 X^3-3 X-6\right) & \\
\hline-10 X^2-X+7 &
\end{array}
$$

$$
C(X)=3 X^5+2 X^4-2 X^2+1=\underbrace{\left(X^3+X+2\right)}_{D(X)} \cdot\left(3 X^2+2 X-3\right)+\left(-10 X^2-X+7\right)
$$
content.html:
\[\begin{array}{r|r} 3 X^5+2 X^4-2 X^2+1 & X^3+X+2 \\ -\left(3 X^5+3 X^3+6 X^2\right) & 3 X^2+2 X-3 \\ \hline 2 X^4-3 X^3-8 X^2+1 & \\ -\left(2 X^4+2 X^2+4 X\right) & \\ \hline-3 X^3-10 X^2-4 X+1 & \\ -\left(-3 X^3-3 X-6\right) & \\ \hline-10 X^2-X+7 & \end{array}\]

\[C(X)=3 X^5+2 X^4-2 X^2+1=\underbrace{\left(X^3+X+2\right)}_{D(X)} \cdot\left(3 X^2+2 X-3\right)+\left(-10 X^2-X+7\right)\]
